titles.title: I will not let you go

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will not let You go until You bless me (2)
Bless me, O Lord, bless me, O Lord
I will not let You go until You bless me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Rend the veil of the flesh in me (2)
Face to face I will see You
Rend the veil of the flesh in me.
